name: @malloydata/malloy-filter
description: Parsers for the Malloy filtering sub-languages

scripts.build: npm run build-parsers && tsc --build && npm run generate-flow
scripts.build-parsers: mkdir -p src/lib && nearleyc src/grammars/fexpr_string.ne --out src/lib/fexpr_string_parser.ts && nearleyc src/grammars/fexpr_number.ne --out src/lib/fexpr_number_parser.ts && nearleyc src/grammars/ftemporal.ne --out src/lib/ftemporal_parser.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
